name: EBG Federation
legal: Section 8 Company under Companies Act 2013- Not for profit organisation
goal: EBG Federation (EBG) in India aims to promote Europe as India's most preferred business partner thus creating an environment that allows European Business to flourish. EBG aims to be the voice of European companies in India. EBG’s focus is on high level advocacy both for large European companies and SME’s who are our members.
interests: Banking and financial services, Budget, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Consumers, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, International co-operation and development, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
-EBG Federation’s Sector Committees covering 18 key sectors works to provide the ground realities and submit recommendations to its stakeholders both in India and Europe to help the European business community to do business in India. It works to improve ease of doing business in India.

-EBG Federation has recently set up an SME Forum for European SME’s in India.
